mapper.insert: insert into festival (bno,name,opar,fstvlCo,phone,homepage,auspcInstt,latitude,hardness,lnmadr,rdnmadr,location,startdate,enddate) select boardseq.nextval, #{name}, #{opar}, #{fstvlCo}, #{phone}, #{homepage}, #{auspcInstt}, #{latitude}, #{hardness},#{lnmadr},#{rdnmadr},#{location}, #{startdate}, #{enddate} from dual WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM festival WHERE name = #{name} and startdate = #{startdate})
mapper.select: select * from festival order by startdate desc
